name: Oppai Girl
description:
Oppai Girl is a puzzle casual game that restores puzzles by swapping tiles.

The purpose of this game is to make you relax and have fun.

If you find the puzzle too difficult or want to restore the image directly, try cheating mode (keyboard C).

You can generate custom puzzle by using your local image.Features:
  • Nice original artwork
  • Relaxing and nice music
  • Cg gallery
  • Achievements worth collecting
  • Importing local image to generate custom puzzle

All characters are over the age of 18, they don't include sexually suggestive content involving minors.
